title: Integrated Instructional Design Framework Development for Internet-Based Vocational Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and science education experience
context.additional_context: Collaboration-focused learning environment centered on hands-on practice with digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can develop an internet-based instructional design framework through theory integration using the Delphi technique.
Learners can establish a design and implementation plan for PBL projects suitable for vocational education in science fields.
Learners can apply psychology-based learning strategies to enhance learner engagement in digital environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
